chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Unique Friendship
chapters.content: This chapter introduces the friendship between a large friendly elephant and a tiny, witty chiti. Despite their vast physical differences, they share a deep bond.
chapters.imagePrompt: An elephant and an ant sitting together in a forest, sharing a peaceful moment.

chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Elephant's Sadness
chapters.content: The elephant feels sad about not being able to play certain games due to his large size. However, the chiti promises to help him.
chapters.imagePrompt: A sad elephant sitting alone, while a small ant talks to him patiently.

chapters.title: Chapter 3: Chiti's Ingenious Plan
chapters.content: Chiti devises a brilliant and unique plan to allow the elephant to partake in the games. The plan involves teamwork and clever use of the elephant's size.
chapters.imagePrompt: An ant showing a sketched plan to a curious-looking elephant.

chapters.title: Chapter 4: Success of the Plan
chapters.content: After some struggles and teamwork, the plan proves successful, and the elephant is overjoyed to play games that he once thought were impossible for him.
chapters.imagePrompt: A smiling elephant playing happily, with a proud ant standing on its head.

chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Moral of the Story
chapters.content: The story concludes by emphasizing that size is not a hindrance to achieving one's desires. Every problem, no matter how big or small, can be overcome with ingenuity, hard work, and most importantly, true friendship.
chapters.imagePrompt: An accomplished elephant and a triumphant ant, with their bond stronger than ever.
chapters.moral: No matter how big or small you are, your size doesn't define your capabilities or limit your potential. Teamwork and friendship can overcome even the biggest obstacles.
